representation_information.name: ID3 Metadata for MP3, Version 2
representation_information.description: Structured data chunk containing descriptive metadata about the file to which it is generally pre-pended (see File type signifiers), virtually always an MP3_FF (MP3 sound file). Referred to by its creators as an "informal standard" for a "container format," ID3v2 permits the identification of title, artist, date, genre, and more.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
